Sports and Clubs: Gourdaha Kuhu Keka Sangh since 1957, associated with Swadeshi game; and West Bengal Champion in Swadeshi Game i.e., Gadi and Goji Competition, 1965
Social And Cultural Activities: , Gourdaha Kuhu-Keka Sangh (from 1957 to till date), Organised various cultural social and religious programmes; associated with various clubs, libraries, co-operative societies and other socio cultural activities
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Watching Cricket, Football match, Drama, Music, Gozi and Gadi Competition (rural games).
Educational Qualifications: M.A.(History), B.T. Educated at South Garia Jadunath Vidyamandir, Vidyasagar , St. Xaviers College, Calcutta University and Jadavpur University,(JU), Kolkata, West Bengal
Other Information: (i)South 24 Parganas, District Congress Committee, 1970-1972, 1980-1987, and 1993-1997; (ii) South 24 Parganas, District Trinamool Congress, 2001-2007; (iii) West Bengal Trinamool Congress SC/ST/OBC Cell; - Hari-Har Mahavidyalaya Ghutiari Sharif, P.S. Caning, South 24, Parganas; Head Master, Narayanpur Akshay Vidyamandir, 1963-1972;, Harihar Mahavidyalaya, 1977-2001; , Banking Service Interview Board (One Group), 1984 and Indian Jute Development Council, 1981-1984;, Handloom and Handicraft Development Commission, 1981-1983; , `Gourdaha Samabay Krishi Unnayan`
